title: Cardi B Recalls What Shakira Told Her When She ‘Felt the Love Dying’ in Marriage to Offset
summary: The rapper says she's now the "strongest" she's ever been.
body: Cardi B went through a rough time recently, but luckily, Shakira was there to help her through some of it. Related Cardi B Tells Nicki Minaj to ‘Keep My Child Name Out Your Mouth’ Following ‘Backhanded Apology’ How Does Cardi B’s First-Week ‘Am I the Drama’ Performance Compare to Our Expectations? A Timeline of Cardi B & Offset’s Relationship In an interview on Jay Shetty’s On Purpose podcast posted Monday (Oct. 6), the rapper looked back on the period of time in her marriage to Offset during which she felt their feelings for each other waning. “I also feel like my marriage, I felt the love dying — from my end, from his end,” Cardi said. “I was very lonely, because I chose to be lonely.” “Around that time, I was working with Shakira, and I was like, ‘How the f–k did you overcame this?'” she continued of her “Punteria” collaborator. “Like, how did you overcame this?
